verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Alle alle alleluia
Alle alle alleluia

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oo Alle alle alleluia
Alle alle alle alle luia (Oo)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alle alle alle alle luia
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus is the Way,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus is the Truth, (Oo)
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus is the Life

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus is the Way, is the Truth, is the Life (Oo)
Jesus is the Way, is the Truth,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
is the Life
(Oo) Alle alle alleluia....
